title: Lookfantastic launch limited edition Discovery Bags that are priced from £12
text:
Get the biggest Money Deals stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Lookfantastic has launched a collection of Discovery Bags and there are several cult beauty favourites to be found for less.

Providing a simple way to transform your beauty look, the range is in collaboration with seven luxury cosmetic brands - including Eve Lom, Clinique and Lipstick Queen.

The Discovery Bags can be purchased on lookfantastic.com and prices start from as little as £12. We can't wait to try them all.

Whether you want to keep your summer glow all year round or need a new lipstick shade for the upcoming party season, the limited edition bags are packed with five different sized goodies that will help step up your regime.

This beats shopping for an entire new routine in the beauty aisles, which can often be pricey and time consuming.

Each range of products has been carefully selected to provide a routine for various needs.

What's more, the stylish bags are worth more than their price to ensure you're getting the most for your money.

What's included in the Lookfantastic Discovery Bag collection? First Aid Beauty , £20 (worth £32) Pure Skin Face Cleanser worth £4

High Impact Mascara worth £8.53 This article contains affiliate links, we may receive a commission on any sales we generate from it. Learn more

Lookfantastic is also set to launch it's popular beauty advent calendar for 2019 , the £79 calendar is worth a whopping £420 and is available to order now online from lookfantastic.com .
description: The collection features seven premium cosmetic brands including Clinique and Lipstick Queen
